title: This is the title
text:
Our team of graphic designers, user experience specialists,
          business talents and developers form a group of like-minded
          web design professionals. We bring to the table different
          experiences, perspectives and ideas from all corners of the world.

          At booncon PIXELS we care deeply about people and interactions.
          Our international Experience Design Studio based in the heart of Helsinki
          creates captivating brands, websites and applications.
          Users’ perspective and a cheerful working culture are at the core of
          everything we do and make our design driven solutions perfect for
          today’s ever-changing digital world.
